subject: Mascots
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Uga VII, the latest in a long line of University of Georgia mascots, died last November. On Saturday, a new bulldog will take over, and the changing of the Uga is serious business at Georgia.
snippet: Uga VII, the latest in a long line of University of Georgia mascots, died last November. On Saturday, a new bulldog will take over, and the changing of the Uga is serious business at Georgia.
